attributes.action: Protect the elderly 60+ & vulnerable with lockdown. Keep all businesses open
attributes.additional_details: The economic effects, suicide rate, businesses closing, mental health, spouse and child abuse are spiking due to lockdown effects. Lockdowns across the globe have not worked with all country's having 2nd or 3rd waves.
attributes.background: Lockdown measures for the elderly 60+ and vulnerable only. Keep all business's open and carry on with the extensive measures already put in place. Hands, face, space. The scientific data does not show a risk or support a need for under 60's to be locked down.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Fund & provide services to allow the vulnerable to shield & re-open the economy
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552023
